thread.title: 'Naughty' Samsung hijacks iPhone 6s launch as Apple rival hands out freebies to people in queue
thread.title_full: 'Naughty' Samsung hijacks iPhone 6s launch as Apple rival hands out freebies to people in queue

author: Jasper Hamill
title: 'Naughty' Samsung hijacks iPhone 6s launch as Apple rival hands out freebies to people in queue
text:
'Naughty' Samsung hijacks iPhone 6s launch as Apple rival hands out freebies to people in queue 11:21, 25 Sep 2015 Rival tech firm decides it doesn't want to let Apple hog the limelight and launches audacious stunt of its own Share Get daily news by email Invalid e-mail Watch this video again Watch Next 
This video show the moment Samsung gatecrashed Apple's iPhone 6s launch party to advertise its own rival smartphone, the Galaxy S6. 
Whilst Apple staff were high-fiving and whopping to greet customers at the flagship store on Regent Street, Samsung foot soldiers marched down the street waving banners and handing out fliers. 
One shocked Apple security guard said the stunt was "naughty", whilst passersby remarked on its audacity. 
But Samsung staff were unmoved, busily spreading the message that "the itch to switch just got bigger". 
They also handed out goodies emblazoned with the slogan "#NextisNew”. 
Of course, the Apple fans did not have their mind changed by the campaign, eagerly bouncing out of the store with their brand new mobile phones. Poll loading …
